attributes.action: CONSIDER DEPORTING ALL FOREIGN NATIONALS CURRENTLY IN JAIL, BACK TO THEIR OWN COUNTRIES TO FINISH THEIR SENTENCES, THEREBY REDUCING OVERCROWDING AND RELIEVING SOME OF THE BURDEN ON OUR TAXPAYERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
